faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly. We're happy to help.

items.question: How do I choose the right solution?
items.answer: We recommend booking a demo first. Once we understand your needs and target scenarios, we'll provide the most suitable solution recommendations. Each solution can be customized to your requirements.

items.question: What hardware equipment is needed?
items.answer: It depends on the solution. VR/MR solutions require VR headsets and related hardware; AR solutions can use smartphones or tablets; smart spaces require IoT sensors; AI solutions are primarily software services.

items.question: What is the approximate implementation cost?
items.answer: Costs depend on project scale and complexity. PoC validation stages are typically lower, while full project development depends on requirements. Please book a demo for detailed pricing.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive maintenance services including system monitoring, troubleshooting, version updates, and performance optimization. Maintenance plans can be selected based on your needs.
